common_worm_same_validity_label: Same as the copy retention period
common_worm_same_validity_tip_label: When you choose to retain copies permanently, the actual WORM validity period is 20 years for the copies in snapshot format and 70 years for the copies in directory format. This is because copies in snapshot format can be retained for up to 20 years and those in directory format can be retained for up to 70 years on the backup storage.
common_retention_worm_label: The copy retention period must be greater than or equal to the WORM validity period.
common_worm_retention_label: The WORM validity period cannot exceed the copy retention period and cannot be shortened.
common_worm_shorten_label: Do not shorten the retention period of a WORM copy. It can only be prolonged.
common_worm_protection_alarm_label: The SLA already contains a WORM policy, which conflicts with the existing WORM policies of the resources to be protected. Select an SLA that does not contain a WORM policy or select other resources to be protected.
common_open_worm_tips_label: After this function is enabled, the copy cannot be changed to a non-WORM copy within the WORM validity period.
common_set_worm_copy_label: Set a copy as a WORM copy
common_security_worm_alarm_label: WORM cannot be enabled because the resources associated with the SLA have been enabled with the data security WORM policy.
common_valid_database_name_label: The name contains only letters, digits, and underscores (_).
common_valid_opengauss_database_name_lab: The following names are not supported: postgres, vastbase, template0, template1.
common_warning_confirm_label: I have read and understand the consequences associated with performing this operation.
common_forcibly_delete_copy_label: Forcibly delete the copy data upon deletion failure
common_copies_today_help_label: The current view can display only the first 100 copies. To view more copies, click the list view icon.
common_whitelist_tip_label: Separate file name extensions using commas (,).

common_open_performance_link_label: Monitoring data cannot be viewed. Enable performance monitoring first.

common_valid_db2_name_label: The name must start with an uppercase letter and consist of digits, uppercase letters, and underscores (_).
common_valid_script_label: Contains 4 to 32 characters including letters, digits, underscores (_), and hyphens (-), starts with a digit, letter, or underscore (_), and ends with .bat or .sh.
common_samehistorypwd_label: The new password must be different from the old one.
common_pwdtip_label:
Complexity requirements:
1. Contains {0} to {1} characters.
2. Contains a special character. Special characters include !"#$%&'()*+,-./:;<=>?@[\]^`{_|}~ and spaces.
3. Contains {2} upper case letters, lower case letters, and digits.
4. Cannot contain more than {3} consecutive identical characters. {4}
common_pwdtip_five_six_label:
5. Cannot be the reverse of the user name.
6. Cannot contain the user name.
common_private_key_pwdtip_label:
Complexity requirements:
1. Contains {0} to {1} characters.
2. Contains a special character. Special characters include !"#$%&'()*+,-./:;<=>?@[\]^`{_|}~ and spaces.
3. Contains upper case letters, lower case letters, and digits.
4. Cannot contain more than {2} consecutive identical characters.
common_community_tips_label: In SNMP, community names are used to authenticate and authorize SNMP agent access users. You can configure the SNMP community name to ensure that only authorized users can access and manage the server.
common_endpoint_placeholder_label: Enter the domain name or service plane IP address of the object storage service.
common_service_adress_placeholder_label: The address format is http://Agent server IP address:Port number.
common_valid_archive_storage_name_label: Contains 3 to 30 characters, including uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, and the special characters ("-", "_", ".", and "@").
common_export_all_label: You are about to export all {0} information.
common_export_selected_label: You are about to export the selected {0} information.
common_logout_confirm_label: Are you sure you want to log out of the system?
common_capacity_reach80_label: Approx. {0}{1} days for the used capacity to reach 80%
common_capacity_reach100_label: Approx. {0}{1} days for the used capacity to reach 100%
common_modify_password_desc_label: For account security purposes, change the password.
common_tape_archive_download_tip_label: You will download the copy data ({0}) to OceanProtect X8000.
common_restore_to_location_tip_label:
You are about to restore data using copy ({0}).
Ensure that the target location is correct.
common_database_restore_to_location_tip_:
You are about to restore data using copy ({0}).
Ensure that the target location is correct and its remaining space is greater than the size of the copy to be restored before reduction.
common_clickhouse_restore_tips_label:
You are about to restore copy data ({0}).
Ensure that the target location for restoration is correct and its remaining space is greater than the size of the copy to be restored before reduction.
common_clickhouse_filelevel_restore_tips: You are about to restore the table. Ensure that the target location for restoration is correct and its remaining space is greater than the size of the copy to be restored before reduction.
common_tape_archive_download_successfull: The download copy data command has been issued successfully.
common_dme_admin_desc_label: Built-in role. This role has permissions to query cluster and capacity information, perform SAML user operations (add, delete, modify, and query), and manage quotas and functions.
common_sys_admin_desc_label: Built-in role. This role has all system permissions.
common_user_desc_label: Built-in role. This role has data protection permissions, such as backup and restoration.
common_user_cyber_desc_label: Built-in role. This role has data security permissions.
common_auditor_desc_label: Built-in role. This role has only read-only permission but can audit the system.
common_useadmin_desc_label: This role has the permission to repurpose data, such as viewing resources, copy mounts, jobs, and alarms.
common_devicemanager_desc_label: This role is the super administrator of OceanStor Dorado or FusionStorage. It can only manage, maintain, and inspect devices but cannot log in to the GUI.
common_remote_device_administrator_desc_: Built-in role. This role can be used for authentication between the source and target clusters during copy replication.
common_endtime_error_label: The end time must be later than the start time.
common_copy_delete_label:
You are about to delete copy ({0}). Deleted copies will be removed from the system and cannot be restored.
Suggestion: Before performing this operation, ensure that you have selected the correct copy.
common_snapshot_delete_label:
You are about to delete snapshot ({0}). Deleted snapshots will be removed from the system and cannot be restored.
Suggestion: Before performing this operation, ensure that you have selected the correct snapshot.
common_copy_uninfected_delete_label:
You are about to delete copy ({0}). This operation will delete this copy from the system and cannot be undone. After this operation, ransomware detection accuracy will decrease because this copy is the last clean copy of the resource.
Suggestion: Exercise caution when performing this operation.
common_copy_batch_delete_uninfected_labe:
You are about to delete copy ({0}).Deleted copies will be removed from the system and cannot be restored. After this operation, the ransomware detection accuracy of subsequent copies will be affected as copy ({1}) is the latest uninfected copy in the resource.
Suggestion: Before performing this operation, ensure that you have selected the correct copy.
common_equipment_type_tip_label: You can only add OceanProtect Backup Storage of 1.6.0 or later that does not have OceanProtect DataBackup installed. Ensure that this storage device has not been added to other sets of OceanProtect. After the storage device is added, you cannot install OceanProtect DataBackup on it.
common_equipment_type_xseries_tip_label: You can only add OceanProtect Backup Storage that does not have OceanProtect DataBackup installed. Ensure that this storage device has not been added to other sets of OceanProtect. After the storage device is added, you cannot install OceanProtect DataBackup on it.
common_select_port_label: Select a port to add a link
common_include_port_no_link_label: Contains ports that do not have replication links.
common_delete_device_label:
You are about to remove storage device ({0}).
Suggestion: Before performing this operation, ensure that you have selected the correct storage device.
common_hot_backup_tip_label: Before creating a snapshot copy, set the Oracle data to be in the hot backup mode to ensure the data consistency.
common_valid_fileset_name_label: Contains 4 to 64 characters, including letters, digits, underscores (_), and hyphens (-), and can start only with a letter or an underscore (_).
common_valid_gaussdb_name_label: Contains 4 to 64 characters, including letters, digits, underscores (_), and hyphens (-), and can start only with a letter.
common_same_table_to_namespace_label: Tables with the same name cannot be restored to the same namespace.
common_format_error_label: The file format is incorrect. Only the {0} format is supported.
common_same_filter_error_label: The same filter criterion already exists.
common_path_error_label: The path does not meet the requirements. Enter a correct path.
common_script_oracle_linux_help_label: Ensure that the script is stored in the DataBackup/ProtectClient/ProtectClient-E/sbin/thirdparty directory on the database host and the user (user root by default) who has logged in to the database host is permitted to execute the script.
common_script_sqlserver_windows_help_lab: Ensure that the script is stored in the DataBackup\ProtectClient\ProtectClient-E\bin\thirdparty directory on the database host and the user (user Administrator by default) who has logged in to the database host is permitted to execute the script.
common_script_hdfs_linux_help_label: Ensure that the script is stored in the DataBackup/ProtectClient/ProtectClient-E/sbin/thirdparty directory on the client and that user rdadmin has the execute permission on the script.
common_script_windows_help_label: Ensure that the script is stored in \bin\thirdparty and the user who logs in to the database host has the execute permission on the script.
common_script_help_label: Ensure that the user who logs in to the database host has the execute permission on the script.
common_script_linux_placeholder_label: Enter the script name. The script name ends with .sh.
common_script_windows_placeholder_label: Enter the script name. The script name ends with .bat.
common_valid_pure_number_label: Enter a number that does not start with 0.
common_command_successfully_label: Command issued successfully. Check the task execution status in the job list.
common_destination_tip_label: Other databases cannot exist in the destination path.
common_script_linux_window_placeholder_l: Enter the script name. The script name ends with .sh or .bat.
common_script_agent_position_label: Save the script in the /DataBackup/ProtectClient/ProtectClient-E/sbin/thirdparty directory of the Agent environment.
common_script_agent_windows_position_lab: Save the script in the DataBackup\ProtectClient\ProtectClient-E\bin\thirdparty directory of the Agent environment.
common_permanent_or_increment_backup_lab: Forever Incremental (Synthetic Full) or incremental Backup
common_full_backup_tips_label: Backs up all data at the current time point
common_incremental_backup_tips_label: Backs up changed data since the last backup
common_log_backup_tips_label: Backs up archived logs at the current time point
common_diff_backup_tips_label: Backs up changed data since the last full backup
common_permanent_backup_tips_label: If no full copy exists, full backup is performed for the first forever incremental (synthetic full) backup, and subsequent backup will be incremental backup
common_permanent_or_increment_backup_tip: During batch manual backup of filesets, incremental backup is performed for the filesets with the small file aggregation function enabled, and forever incremental (synthetic full) backup is performed for the filesets with this function disabled
common_range_date_error_label: The selected time is beyond the restorable time range.
common_init_running_label: The initial configuration takes about 2 minutes, and the current progress is {0}%. Please wait…
common_init_auth_failed_label: Failed to configure or modify authentication settings.
common_init_backup_failed_label: Failed to configure or modify backup network settings.
common_init_archive_failed_label: Failed to configure or modify archive network settings.
common_file_directory_keyword_label: Enter the file name or path. Fuzzy search is supported
common_object_bucket_keyword_label: Enter an object name or prefix path. Fuzzy search is supported.
common_file_download_processing_label: Preparing to download files. Ensure that the disk space is sufficient.
common_file_download_completed_label: Files have been downloaded. Click <span class='file-download-completed'> to save them to the local computer.
common_file_download_error_label: Failed to download files. Try again later.
common_file_upload_error_label: Failed to upload files. Try again later.
common_cluster_name_invalid_label: Contains 4 to 32 characters, including letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (_), and hyphens (-), and cannot start with a hyphen (-) or period (.).
common_target_cluster_name_invalid_label: Contains 4 to 256 characters, including letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (_), and hyphens (-), and cannot start with a hyphen (-) or period (.).
common_storage_pool_name_invalid_label: Contains 4 to 64 characters, including letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (_), and hyphens (-), and cannot start with a hyphen (-) or period (.).
common_cluster_ip_tip_label: Enter the management plane IP address of the target cluster.
common_cluster_user_name_tip_label: Enter the user name of {0} for the target cluster.
common_ip4_ipv6_placeholder_label: Enter an IPv4 or IPv6 address.
common_select_instance_host_label: The hosts with registered database instances are displayed in the drop-down list.
common_valid_same_start_ipv4_label: The value cannot be the same as the start IP address.
common_valid_same_end_ipv4_label: The value cannot be the same as the end IP address.
common_valid_float_ipv4_label: The value cannot fail between the start IP address and the end IP address.
common_valid_same_start_end_ipv4_label: The start IP address cannot be the same as the end IP address.
common_valid_same_end_start_ipv4_label: The end IP address cannot be the same as the start IP address.
common_valid_invalid_start_ipv4_label: The start IP address cannot be larger than the end IP address.
common_valid_invalid_end_ipv4_label: The end IP address cannot be smaller than the start IP address.
common_invalid_same_ipv4_network_label: The start and end IP addresses are not in the same network segment.
common_storage_username_desc_label: Username and password for security authentication between {0} and the hardware management platform (DeviceManager).
common_storage_username_e6000_desc_label: Username and password for security authentication between {0} and the hardware management platform (OceanStor Pacific).
common_add_backup_route_desc_label: Configure a route when the backup network and resources to be protected are in different network segments.
common_add_archive_route_desc_label: Configure a route when the archive network and resources to be protected are in different network segments.
common_archive_backup_network_diff_label: The archive network and backup network are in different network segments.
common_system_language_install_desc_labe: The system management page will be displayed in the selected language. You are not permitted to switch the language on the system management page.
common_toggle_language_label: You are about to set the system language to {0}. After the setting is successful, the system management page will be displayed in this language. Language switchover is not supported. Are you sure you want to continue?
common_about_warning_label: Warning: This computer program is protected by copyright law and international treaties. Unauthorized duplication or distribution of this program, or any portion of it, may result in severe civil or criminal penalties, and will be prosecuted to the maximum extent possible under the law.
common_about_open_backup_label: open-eBackup provides E2E including data backup and data recovery capabilities for mainstream databases, virtualization, file systems, big data and other applications, helping users achieve efficient backup of critical data and save data protection investments.
common_vlan_id_desc_label: The VLAN ID cannot be changed once being submitted. Ensure that the entered VLAN ID is correct before submitting it.
common_backup_service_network_desc_label: Network segment from which IP addresses are allocated to internal backup components.
common_archive_service_network_desc_labe: Network segment from which IP addresses are allocated to internal archive components.
common_sysadmin_label: Built-in account, which can be used to log in to the GUI and invoke REST APIs.
common_mmdp_admin_label: Built-in account, which cannot be used to log in to the GUI and can only be used to invoke REST APIs.
common_mm_audit_label: Built-in account, which cannot be used to log in to the GUI and can only be used to invoke REST APIs.
common_cluster_admin_label: Built-in machine-machine account, which cannot be used to log in to the GUI and can only be used to invoke REST APIs.
common_task_stop_label:
You are about to stop jobs.
Suggestion: Before performing this operation, ensure that the jobs need to be stopped.
common_valid_same_gateway_start_ipv4_lab: The gateway IP address must be different from the start IP address.
common_valid_same_gateway_end_ipv4_label: The gateway IP address must be different from the end IP address.
common_valid_same_gateway_float_ipv4_lab: The gateway IP address must be different from the floating IP address.
common_valid_backup_rang_route_ipv4_labe: The gateway IP address cannot be located in the backup service network segment.
common_valid_backup_same_route_ipv4_labe: The gateway IP address and the backup service network segment are not located in the same network segment.
common_valid_archive_rang_route_ipv4_lab: The gateway IP address cannot be located in the archive service network segment.
common_valid_archive_same_route_ipv4_lab: The gateway IP address and the archive service network segment are not located in the same network segment.
common_quick_search_label: Click to global search for directories, files, resources, and operations.
common_valid_space_label: The entered value cannot contain any space.
common_init_save_label:
You are about to modify the network configuration. After the modification, the configured routing information may be deleted.
Suggestion: Before performing this operation, ensure that the network configuration needs to be modified.
common_dns_save_label:
You are about to modify the DNS service.
Suggestion: Before performing this operation, check whether the DNS service configuration needs to be modified.
common_browser_zoom_label:
Optimize display by setting your OS and browser zoom to 100%:
1. Windows 7: Go to Control Panel > Display.For other operating systems, perform operations based on the site requirements.
2. Major browsers: Press Ctrl+0 (Windows) or Command+0 (macOS).
common_valid_name_begin_label: Start only with a letter or an underscore (_).
common_valid_linux_user_name_begin_label: The value must start with a letter, digit, or underscore (_).
common_valid_linux_user_name_label: The value can contain only letters, digits, hyphens (-), and underscores (_).
common_valid_desensitization_rule_name_c: Include only letters, digits, spaces, hyphens (-), and underscores (_).
common_valid_name_with_allowed_dots_labe: The value can contain only letters, digits, underscores (_), hyphens (-), and periods (.), and cannot start with a hyphen (-) or a period (.).
common_expire_day_label: The password will expire in {0} days, please change the password timely.
common_valid_file_path_label: Cannot contain special characters !':;|`$<>&-()#?"\*, start with a period (.) or space, or end with a space. Path separator / cannot be directly followed by a period (.).
common_file_system_report_label: Enter a file system or report name.
common_upload_files_num_label: A maximum of {0} files can be uploaded at a time.
common_capacity_trend_view_label: Analyzing the capacity trend... Please check later.
common_init_backup_mtu_desc_label: minimum MTU value of the switch port on the network link from the switch connected to the production host to the backup network switch connected to the backup port of the data protection appliance. You are advised to use the default MTU value (1500) for all switch ports on the network link.
common_init_archive_mtu_desc_label: minimum MTU value of the switch port on the network link from the switch connected to the archive storage to the archive network switch connected to the archive port of the data protection appliance. You are advised to use the default MTU value (1500) for all switch ports on the network link.
common_init_replied_mtu_desc_label: minimum MTU value of the switch port on the network link from the switch connected to the replication storage to the replication network switch connected to the replication port of the data protection appliance. You are advised to use the default MTU value (1500) for all switch ports on the network link.
common_english_the_last_day_of_every_mon: The last day of every month
common_export_query_desc_label: Export records of the last 30 days are retained. For client logs, only the latest 10 export records are retained. For system logs, only the latest five export records are retained. For configuration files, only the latest export record is retained.
common_export_query_other_desc_label: Export records of the last 30 days are retained. For client logs, only the latest 10 export records are retained. For system logs, only the latest five export record is retained.
common_export_query_special_desc_label: Export records of the most recent 30 days are retained.
common_export_query_delete_label:
You are about to delete export record ({0}). After this operation, this record will be deleted from the system and cannot be recovered.
Suggestion: Before performing this operation, ensure that the selected record is correct.
common_export_name_confirm_label: You can customize the file name displayed after exporting. You are advised to customize the file name based on the content of the file or directory. If the file name is not customized, a random file name will be generated.
common_export_files_result_label: Succeeded in delivering the file export command. You can click “Export Records” to check the export result.
common_timeout_retry_label:
Cause: The system is busy.
Suggestion: Please try again later.
common_register_type_desc_label:
Proxy mode: Push and install the corresponding backup agent on the host. After the agent is installed, the host is automatically registered to the data protection all-in-one machine through the agent.

Agentless mode: No need to install a backup agent on the host where the application is located. Windows hosts are added through VMI, and non-Windows hosts are added through SSH. Query the application types that use agentless backup.
common_host_max_number_label: A maximum of {0} hosts are supported.
common_host_min_number_label: A minimum of {0} hosts are supported.
common_patroni_path_label: Full Path of Patroni Configuration File
common_generate_verify_file_disable_labe: No copy verification file is generated. This function cannot be enabled.
common_invalid_verify_file_disable_label: This function cannot be enabled because the copy check status is Invalid.
common_input_operate_database_username_l: Enter the username of the OS running the database
common_input_kingbase_instance_name_labe: Instance name, which can be customized
common_select_hcs_disk_label:
Cause: The target disk has insufficient capacity.
Suggestion: Select another target disk.
common_select_not_encrypted_hcs_disk_lab:
Cause: Non-encrypted disks cannot be restored to encrypted disks. 
Suggestion: Select another disk as the target one.
common_select_encrypted_hcs_disk_label: Cause: Encrypted disks can only be restored to the original ones, and their encryption modes must be the same.
common_select_fc_disk_label:
Cause: The target datastore has insufficient capacity.
Suggestion: Select another datastore.
common_target_disk_remain_help_label: Remaining capacity of the target disk = Capacity of the target disk – Disk capacity
common_select_disk_help_label: After automatic protection is enabled, all disks (including newly detected disks) of the VM will be protected. If automatic protection is disabled, you need to manually select disks to be protected.
common_select_aps_disk_help_label:
After automatic protection is enabled, all EVS disks (including newly detected EVS disks) under the cloud server will be protected.
If automatic protection is disabled, you need to manually select EVS disks to be protected.
common_select_hcs_disk_protect_label: Some selected hosts have no disk. Protection is not supported.
common_restore_disk_name_label: Name of Disk to Be Restored
common_fc_user_name_tips_label: Before registration, login to FusionCompute and create a user connected to OceanProtect for backup and restoration.
common_fco_user_name_tips_label: Before registration, login to FusionOne Compute and create a user connected to OceanProtect for backup and restoration.
common_host_cancel_trustworthiness_warn_:
You are about to set the host as an untrusted host. After this operation, the host cannot be used for other services.
Suggestion: Before performing this operation, ensure that this host is not used for other services.
common_host_trust_switch_tips_label: Enhances system security. Preventing the system from being attacked through client certificate forging by untrusted hosts beyond the whitelist.
common_host_trust_open_tips_label: The host trust function will be provided. You need to choose Protection > Clients, and click More > Trust to set trusted hosts. Data protection services are supported only for trusted hosts.
common_host_trust_close_tips_label: You are about to disable the trust function. After this operation, the system no longer performs whitelist verification for hosts, which may cause security risks.
common_host_trustworthiness_info_label: You are about to trust the host. Ensure that you have verified authenticity of the host.
common_database_restore_info_label: Before restoration, ensure that the database at the target location has been shut down. Otherwise, the restoration will fail.
common_instance_restore_info_label: Before restoration, ensure that the instance at the target location has been stopped. Otherwise, the restoration will fail.
common_hcs_add_data_store_label: If the backend storage of Huawei Cloud Stack is Huawei scale-out block storage and an external client is used, you do not need to add storage resources. In other scenarios, you need to add storage resources; otherwise, the backup job will fail.
common_fc_add_data_store_label: If the data storage types of VM disks include eVol storage, add storage resources. Otherwise, the backup job will fail.
common_vmware_add_data_store_label: Add storage resources when VMs containing RDM disks are involved in backup or restoration or storage-layer backup needs to be performed. Otherwise, backup or restoration jobs will fail.
common_hcs_cloud_archive_verify_label: Archive copies do not support verification.
common_user_type_help_label:
Super administrator: has the permission to run the sudo command. Only the username and password are required for host registration.
Common user: has no permission to run the sudo command. Only the username and password for host login are required for host registration. The password for running the sudo command as well as the username and password for host login are required for host registration.
common_configuring_storage_ogical_ports_: Configure Storage Authentication and Service Logical Ports
common_configuring_ogical_ports_help_lab: You can configure logical ports on the current page or on the "Services" > "Network" > "Logical Ports" page of DeviceManager after initialization is complete. Create a logical port for each controller.
common_configuring_network_help_label: The service network segment address should not conflict with the container backend network. If you need to use this address, change the container backend network. Backup network configurations are reused by default for the archive and replication networks.
common_reset_configuration_tips_label: You are about to reset the username and password. This operation will delete the username and password, and cause data of the scanned service logical port to be lost. Suggestion: Ensure that you want to perform this operation.
common_create_logical_port_same_name_lab: This logical port name already exists.
common_create_logical_port_backup_same_i: The same logical port IP address exists.
common_create_bonding_port_same_name_lab: This bond port name already exists.
common_force_abort_replication_tip_label: After this function is enabled, if the replication duration exceeds the replication time window set in the Air Gap policy, the replication job will be suspended forcibly.
common_airgap_port_tip_label: Ports that support replication within the time window set in the Air Gap policy.
common_remove_association_offline_tip_la:
You are about to remove Air Gap policy ({0}). The current device is offline and cannot detect the replication link status. After this operation, the replication link status of the storage device may not recover.
Suggestion: Perform this operation when the device is online.
common_remove_association_online_tip_lab:
You are about to remove Air Gap policy ({0}). After this operation, replication jobs can be executed based on the time set in the replication SLA policy without being subjected to the Air Gap replication time window.
Suggestion: Before performing this operation, ensure that the correct policy is selected.
common_turn_on_association_tip_label: You are about to enable Air Gap policy ({0}). After this operation, replication jobs can be executed only within the replication time window set in the policy.
common_turn_off_association_tip_label:
You are about to disable Air Gap policy ({0}). After this operation, replication jobs can be executed based on the time set in the replication SLA policy without being subjected to the Air Gap replication time window.
Suggestion: Before performing this operation, ensure that the correct policy is selected.
common_disk_restore_to_location_tip_labe: You are about to restore data using disk.Ensure that the target location is correct.
common_pvc_restore_to_location_tip_label: You are about to restore the PVC. Ensure that the target location for restoration is correct and the size of the PVC to be restored is less than or equal to that of the PVC at the target location. Otherwise, data may be lost after restoration.
common_airgap_replication_time_tips_labe: Replication is allowed only within the replication time window. A maximum of 3 replication time windows are supported. Different time windows cannot overlap each other.
common_not_supported_airgap_label: An Air Gap policy that has been associated with a storage device cannot be deleted.
common_config_leg_level_tip_label: Configure the log level for the client.
common_export_log_tip_label: You are about to export logs. After this operation, you can choose "System" > "Export Records" to check the results. You can define the name of the compressed package exported, or the system will generate a random name for it.
common_export_most_log_label: A maximum of {0} client logs can be exported at a time.
common_bongding_port_name_tips_label: The value can only contain letters, digit, underscores "_", hyphens "-", and periods (.).
common_bongding_port_name_length_tips_la: The length can be 1 to {0} characters.
common_config_archive_network_tips_label: After this option is enabled, backup network configurations will be reused for the archive network.
common_config_backup_network_tips_label: After this option is enabled, backup network configurations will be reused for the replication network.
common_last_login_ip_label: IP address of the last login
common_select_openstack_disk_help_label:
After automatic protection is enabled, all disks (including newly detected disks) under the cloud host will be protected.
If automatic protection is disabled, you need to manually select disks to be protected.
common_db_two_restore_to_location_tip_la:
You are about to restore data using copy ({0}). During the restoration, the system deletes archive logs from the target location.
Ensure that the target location is correct and its remaining space is greater than the size of the copy to be restored before reduction.
Note: Restore will overwrite the data at the target location.
common_db_restore_to_location_tip_label:
You are about to restore data using copy ({0}).
Ensure that the target location is correct and its remaining space is greater than the size of the copy to be restored before reduction.
Note: Restore will overwrite the data at the target location.
common_general_db_restore_tip_label:
You are about to restore data using copy ({0}).
Ensure that the target location for restoration is correct and its remaining space is greater than the size of the copy to be restored before reduction.
Note: Restore will overwrite the data at the target location.
common_goldendb_restore_to_location_tip_:
You are about to restore data using copy ({0}).
Ensure that the target location is correct and has sufficient space of disk.
Note:
1. Restore will overwrite the data at the target location.
2. If you select restoration to a new location, authentication information at the target end will be overwritten. After the restoration is successful, the instance at the target end will fail to start. You must modify the instance authentication information at the target end and start the instance.
common_hana_restore_to_location_tip_labe:
You are about to restore data using copy ({0}).
Ensure that the target location for restoration is correct and its remaining space is greater than the size of the copy to be restored before reduction.
Node:
1. Data at the target location will be overwritten.
2. System database restoration will cause vStore database information contained in the restoration copy to be synchronized. As a result, some vStore databases may fail to be accessed.
common_cloud_disk_restore_to_location_ti:
You are about to restore the EVS disk. Ensure that the restoration destination is correct.
Note: Restore will overwrite the data at the target location.
common_copy_verification_tips_label: If a backup job has been executed and the initial backup is not full backup, full backup will be performed in some scenarios. For details, see copy verification parameter description in "Creating Backup SLAs".
common_handle_tip_label: Ensure that you have confirmed the failure cause of the job.
common_job_retry_tip_label: Choose Handle to handle the job first before you retry.
common_batch_retry_tip_label: Only the historical restoration or instant restoration jobs whose Handling Status is Handled can be selected.
common_batch_retry_restore_tip_label: You are about to perform batch retry of failed restoration jobs. Ensure that the restoration target locations are correct.
common_shared_file_system_name_label: Name of the Shared File System
common_shared_file_system_time_label: Retention Period of the Shared File System
common_snapshot_restore_danger_tips_labe:
You are about to perform restoration using snapshot ({0}).
This operation will restore a snapshot infected by ransomware.
Suggestion: Before performing this operation, ensure that the correct snapshot is selected.
common_snapshot_restore_tips_label: You are about to restore snapshot data {0}. Ensure that the target location for restoration is correct.
common_local_storage_password_update_tip: You can update the passwords of local storage super administrators automatically created by the system.
common_manger_auth_help_label: Used to redirect and log in to DeviceManager.
common_severice_auth_help_label: Used by the backup system and storage system to perform data protection operations.
common_restore_snapshot_share_path_tips_:
You are about to perform restoration using snapshot ({0}).
Note:
1. Data at the target location will be overwritten.
2. If the restoration job progress is not refreshed within a certain period of time, go to the job details page and perform subsequent operations as prompted.
common_nas_plugin_livemount_nfs_mountinf: Shared path recovery information. Shared path: {0}.
common_dme_livemount_complete_label: The shared path recovery job is complete.
common_lock_running_label: Locking resources in the file system
common_job_log_protection_execute_label: Deliver ransomware detection snapshot generation job {0}.
common_dme_prepare_backup_label: Node ({0}) starts preparing resources for ransomware detection snapshot generation.
common_dme_prepare_backup_failed_label: Resource preparation for ransomware detection snapshot generation fails.
common_dme_backup_data_complete_label: Ransomware detection snapshot generation is complete.
common_dme_create_backup_copy_label: Ransomware detection snapshot generation ({0}) is successful.
common_dme_prepare_livemount_label: Node ({0}) starts preparing shared path restoration.
common_help_signature_algorithm_label: The message signature algorithm is used to verify the connectivity between the hosts where the client is to be installed and the device. hmac-sha1 is an insecure algorithm. For higher security, select hmac-sha2-256. For better compatibility, select hmac-sha1,hmac-sha2-256.
common_cyberengine_worm_disrestore_label: The appliance does not support WORM file system restoration.
common_dameng_register_possword_tips_lab: The value cannot contain more than 48 characters and spaces.
common_isbusiness_ip_tips_label: If "Yes" is selected, this IP address is used for registration. Otherwise, the client checks the connectivity of service port IP addresses and automatically selects a reachable service port IP address for registration.
common_dameng_password_error_label: The password does not meet the verification rules.
common_shnopshot_client_error_label: It cannot contain spaces and cannot start with"-".
common_active_port_failed_alaram_advice_:
Step1 Contact the equipment room administrator to restore the network connectivity and ensure that the network connection is normal.
Step2 Choose "Data Security" > "Air Gap" > "Storage Device", and locate the storage device based on the ESN in the alarm information.
Step3 Check whether the storage device is online and associated with an Air Gap policy.
If yes=>[Step4].
If no, check the status of the replication logical port of the storage device and manually activate the replication logical port. After this operation, manually clear the alarm and no further action is required.
Step4 Click "More" > "Disable Policy" and then "More" > "Enable Policy", or wait for 30 minutes for the system to automatically rectify the fault.
Step5 Check whether the current replication link is connected.
If yes, manually clear the alarm and no further action is required.
If no, collect logs and contact technical support engineers.
common_deactivative_port_failed_alaram_a:
Step1 Contact the equipment room administrator to restore the network connectivity and ensure that the network connection is normal.
Step2 Choose "Data Security" > "Air Gap" > "Storage Device", and locate the storage device based on the ESN in the alarm information.
Step3 Check whether the storage device is online and associated with an Air Gap policy.
If yes=>[Step4].
If no, check the status of the replication logical port of the storage device and manually deactivate the replication logical port. After this operation, manually clear the alarm and no further action is required.
Step4 Click "More" > "Disable Policy" and then "More" > "Enable Policy", or wait for 30 minutes for the system to automatically rectify the fault.
Step5 Check whether the current replication link is disconnected.
If yes, manually clear the alarm and no further action is required.
If no, collect logs and contact technical support engineers.
common_forbidden_strict_mode_tips_label: If the strict mode is enabled for PXC, strict data consistency check is performed during MySQL tablespace restoration, which may cause restoration failure. The PXC strict mode can be disabled.
common_port_network_config_help_label: Obtain the LLD configuration file template
common_lld_network_size_label: The number of network planes is (4), exceeding the upper limit. Change the number of network planes to a value that meets the requirements and try again.
common_lld_config_tip_label: To use the LLD template to configure a complex service network
common_manual_config_tip_label: To configure the service network by manually creating logical ports
common_manual_config_distribute_tip_labe: To configure the service network by manually select ports
common_config_logical_port_tip_label: Create at least one backup service port for each controller. If the replication or archive network is configured, ensure that at least one service port is created for each controller.
common_config_logical_port_unsaved_label: Your network configurations have not taken effect. As a result, services such as backup, replication, and archiving may fail. Choose Modify > Confirm Modification to make the configurations take effect.
common_config_logical_port_unsaved_modif: Your network configurations have not taken effect. As a result, services such as backup, replication, and archiving may fail. Click Confirm Modification to make the configurations take effect.
common_vlan_tip_label: Before enabling this function, ensure that a VLAN has been configured for your services. Otherwise, an error may occur.
common_config_ports_alert_label: The port configuration cannot be changed after being submitted.
common_port_choice_tip_label: The number of available Ethernet network ports is less than 2. Reuse the existing bond port or use an Ethernet network port.
common_old_vlan_id_tip_label: Existing VLAN IDs: {0} . If the VLAN configuration of the selected bond port is not reused, enter a VLAN ID that is different from the existing VLAN IDs.
common_config_vlan_input_error_tip_label: The ID is an integer from 1 to 4094.
common_config_ip_address_failover_tip_la:
After IP address failover is enabled, services on the failed home port will be taken over by an available port in a failover group. In the entire process, the IP address used by services remains unchanged.
During the execution of backup, replication, archive, or restoration jobs, if IP Address Failover is disabled on the service port, the jobs on the node where the service port resides may fail when the service port is faulty.
common_route_add_tip_label: Default route cannot be added if a gateway has been configured for the logical port.
common_network_config_tip_label: Ensure that no job is running during network configuration.
common_network_config_warning_tip_label:
You are about to set the network, which takes some time to complete. Ensure that no job is running.
Are you sure you want to continue?
common_add_route_waring_tip_label:
You are about to add the route of port({0}).If the route is unavailable, this operation will disconnect the storage system from hosts.
Suggestion: Before performing this operation, ensure that the entered route is available.
common_delete_route_warning_tip_label:
You are about to remove the route of port({0}).This operation will interrupt the connection between the storage system and host.
Suggestion:Before you perform this operation, ensure that you have stopped the business on the route.
common_leave_network_config_tip_label:
Your modification is not complete, which may cause backup, replication, and archive services to fail. Click OK at the bottom of the Network Configuration page to complete your modification.
Are you sure you want to exit the Network Configuration page without saving your modification?
common_leave_network_config_modifying_ti: Cannot perform other operations during network configuration.
common_reuse_dm_port_tip_label: Existing logical ports of the storage device can be reused. A reused logical port cannot be modified. Deleting the logical port only deletes a database record.
common_reuse_dm_port_modify_tip_label: A logical port generated by reusing a port cannot be modified.
common_reuse_dm_port_rule_label: The backup service can only reuse the logical ports, for which Role is Service, Data Protocol is NFS + CIFS, and IP Address Failover is enabled. The replication service can only reuse the logical ports whose Role is Replication. The archive service can only reuse the logical ports whose Role is Data backup.
common_dm_exist_tip_label: Whether the logical port exists in the corresponding backup storage device.
common_oceanbase_restore_tips_label: You are about to restore copy data ({0}). Ensure that the target location for restoration is correct and ({1}) does not exist in the target cluster ({2}).
common_system_disk_warn_label: If no system disk is selected, the generated copies do not support index- and file-level restoration.
common_vmtools_help_label: If the system cannot obtain the backup network IP addresses of the VM under Compute Location, install Tools. If the IP addresses are still not obtained after the installation, select Enter IP address.
common_vm_ip_help_label: If the system cannot obtain the backup network IP addresses of the VM under Compute Location, select Enter IP address.
common_cloud_ip_help_label: If the system cannot obtain the backup network IP addresses of the cloud server under Compute Location, select Enter IP address.
common_multi_overview_tip_label: Each node in a backup cluster corresponds to a backup storage unit. After external storage units are added, the capacity of the backup storage units includes the capacity of the external storage units and the total capacity of backup cluster nodes.
common_backup_cluster_name_invalid_label: Contains 4 to 32 characters, including letters, digits, underscores (_), and hyphens (-), and cannot start with a hyphen (-).
common_anti_copy_deleted_label: The ransomware detection snapshot has been deleted.
common_sftp_test_success_label: The SFTP server passes the connectivity test.
common_storage_add_help_label: Multiple management IP addresses are supported. If a management IP address cannot be accessed, the system automatically switches to another accessible management IP address.
common_init_lld_upload_warn_label:
You are about to upload the LLD configuration file. Ensure that the container port in the LLD configuration file is configured as the front-end container port. Otherwise, the initialization fails.
Suggestion: Exercise caution when performing this operation.
common_sudo_no_pwd_tip_label: Whether a common user needs to enter the password of the current user when using the sudo permission.
common_script_protect_agent_position_lab: Save the script in the /DataBackup/ProtectClient/ProtectClient-E/sbin/thirdparty directory in the client installation directory.
common_don't_show_again_label: Do not show this message again.
common_auto_sync_host_name_tips_label:
During registration, the client name reported by the host is used.
After this function is enabled, the changed host name is automatically synchronized to the OceanProtect WebUI. After this function is disabled, The names of a registered clients are not automatically synchronized with the host name but can be modified.
common_compliance_mode_rule_tips_label: For files within the protection period, super administrators, common administrators, and common users cannot modify or delete the files. For files whose protection period expires, super administrators, common administrators, and common users cannot modify the files but can delete them.
common_compliance_mode_company_tips_labe: For files within the protection period, common administrators and users cannot modify or delete the files, but privileged users can delete them. For files whose protection period expires, super administrators, common administrators, and common users cannot modify the files but can delete them.
common_auto_lock_tips_label: When enabled, a file is automatically locked if not modified before the lockout wait time elapses. A locked file is read-only.
common_lock_wait_time_tips_label: A file is automatically locked if not modified before the lockout wait time elapses. A locked file is read-only.
common_auto_delete_tips_label: When enabled, the system automatically deletes files after the protection period expires.
common_sftp_time_tip_label: The value must range from 0 to 70 years.
common_sftp_stop_time_tip_label: The value must range from 1 minute to 10 years.
common_sftp_worm_enable_tip_label: To modify the configuration of the "SFTP_FS_e1f0b07c7ad24daaaceba47cda8b4e66" WORM file system, log in to the local storage to modify it.
common_sftp_worm_disable_tip_label: When the SFTP service is enabled for the first time, a file system (fixed name: SFTP_FS_e1f0b07c7ad24daaaceba47cda8b4e66) is created on the local storage. You can directly set the file system as a WORM file system. If the file system already exists on the local storage, no new file system will be created.
common_config_service_network_tip_label: Select at least one port for each node for backup services on the Backup Network tab page. Replication or archiving services reuse the backup network configuration by default. Therefore, you do not need to configure network for replication or archiving services separately. If you need to configure the network, select at least one port for each node for replication or archiving services on the Replication Network or Archive Network tab page. Under Available Port, only the ports in the zones for which IP address failover is disabled are displayed.
common_config_delete_port_tip_label:
You are about to delete the logical port.
This operation will interrupt the management services or data access services carried by the port.
Suggestion: Before performing this operation, ensure that you have correctly selected the logical port and the logical port is no longer required.
common_config_modify_port_tip_label:
You are about to modify the logical port.
This operation will interrupt the management services or data access services carried by the port.
common_distributed_init_running_label: The initial configuration takes about 1 seconds,The current progress is {0}%. Please wait...
common_config_decouple_service_network_t: Select at least one port for backup services for each node.
common_valid_adfs_username_label: The value must contain 5 to 64 characters in the format of xxx@xxx. Only letters, digits, and special characters (.-_!#$%&'*+/=^`{|}~) are allowed before the at sign (@). Only letters, digits, underscores (_), and periods (.) are allowed after the at sign (@).
common_valid_executiontime_label: The execution time cannot be earlier than the current device time.
common_limit_rate_policy_tip_label: Select a rate limiting policy that has been created on the "Rate Limiting Policies"page.
common_limit_rate_policy_tip_distributed: If you leave this parameter unspecified, the maximum bandwidth is 32 MB/s by default.
common_ndmp_restore_to_location_tip_labe: You are about to restore data using the copy ({0}). Ensure that the restoration target location is correct and has sufficient remaining space. (Space of the restoration target location for restoration using a full copy ≥ Data volume before full copy reduction; space of the restoration target location for restoration using an incremental copy ≥ Data volume before last full copy reduction + Data volume before incremental copy reduction).
common_select_hcs_disk_help_label:
If Automatic EVS Disk Protection is enabled, all EVS disks (including newly detected ones) whose Storage Type is FusionStorage, OceanStor Dorado, or OceanStor of the ECS will be protected.
If this function is disabled, you need to manually select the EVS disks to be protected.
common_add_tag_tip_label: You are about to add tags to {0} objects.
common_remove_tag_tip_label: You are about to remove tags from {0} objects.
common_home_backup_exceed_threshold_labe: Number of backup storage units whose used capacity exceeds the threshold: 1
common_home_top_job_failures_sla_protect: Top Job Failures: SLA Protection Policy
common_comer_guidance_tips_label: Provides step-by-step instructions to help you quickly understand the functions of each module of the OceanProtect.
common_comer_guidance_navigator_tips_lab: Click to hide or display the navigation pane.
common_comer_guidance_global_search_tips: Click to go to the Global Search page.
common_comer_guidance_guide_assistant_ti: Click to open IntelliMate to help you with operations such as backup.
common_comer_guidance_cluster_change_tip: Click to display all clusters. You can switch clusters as needed.

common_comer_guidance_user_center_tips_l: Click to manage your account or switch the appearance.
common_comer_guidance_help_center_tips_l: Click to view the online help and software information.
common_comer_guidance_protection_policy_: Configure and manage service level agreements (SLAs) and rate limiting policies.
common_comer_guidance_explore_tips_label: You can use a copy to perform operations such as recovery, instant mounting, and recovery drill.
common_comer_guidance_live_mount_tips_la: Configure and manage live mount and live mount policies.
common_comer_guidance_recovery_drill_tip: Configure and manage resource restoration drill plans.
common_comer_guidance_data_desensitizati: Configure and manage resource data anonymization policies.
common_comer_guidance_anti-ransomware_ti: View ransomware protection detection results as well as configure and manage ransomware protection and WORM policies.
common_comer_guidance_air_gap_tips_label: Configure and manage Air Gap policies.
common_comer_guidance_menu_job_tips_labe: View and manage current jobs and historical jobs.
common_comer_guidance_menu_alarm_tips_la: View and manage alarms and events.
common_comer_guidance_menu_report_tips_l: Configure and manage reports and report subscription policies.
common_comer_guidance_infrastructure_tip: Configure and manage clusters, archive storage, and backup storage.
common_comer_guidance_security_tips_labe: Configure and manage information such as users and certificates.
common_comer_guidance_log_management_tip: Configure the information about system log export and manage the export records.
common_comer_guidance_settings_tips_labe: Configure and manage information such as networks and tags.
common_comer_guidance_close_tips_label: You can access the Newbie Guide again in IntelliMate.
common_volume_restore_to_location_tip_la:
You are about to restore data using the copy ({0}).
Warning: After the restoration job is executed, all file system information on the target volumes will be overwritten. Are you sure you want to continue?
common_nasshare_restore_to_location_tip_: You are about to restore data using the copy ({0}). Ensure that the target location for restoration has sufficient free space for restoration.
common_nasshare_file_level_restore_to_lo: You are about to restore the {0}. Ensure that the target location for restoration has sufficient free space for restoration.
common_worm_expiration_time_tips_label: If the WORM expiration time is earlier than the WORM file system compliance clock time, the WORM validity period has expired. You can click the copy generation time to view the WORM file system compliance clock time.
common_worm_expiration_time_detail_tips_: If a copy is a WORM copy, the WORM expiration time is displayed.
common_worm_clock_tips_label: An independent clock used for copy anti-tampering. When the WORM clock for a copy reaches the WORM expiration time, the copy becomes a common copy.
common_remain_time_tips_label: Time difference between the WORM clock and the WORM expiration time.
common_expiration_time_tips_label: The actual copy expiration time is subject to the later time between Copy Expiration Time and WORM Expiration Time.
common_modify_owned_user_tip_label: This operation modifies only the owners for generated copies of the resource. After the modification, view the owners on the Copies tab page.
common_force_delete_tip_label: Enable this function to delete a backup storage unit from the system when it contains copies and its Running Status is Offline. After this function is enabled, all copies on the backup storage unit will become invalid.
common_cnware_restore_or_livemount_tip_l: 执行该操作的用户必须关联System Administrator角色，具体请参见《数据备份特性指南(适用于CNware)》文档中的“如何在CNware云平台添加用户权限”章节。

common_linux_os_oracle_label: In the Linux OS scenario, the client can be deployed on:

common_oracle_storage_label: Snapshot-based backup at the storage layer
common_vm_san_client_label: In SAN transmission mode, the client can be deployed on:

common_vm_ndb_client_label: In Hot-ADD transmission mode, the client can be deployed on:

common_delete_sanpshot_help_label: This function is disabled by default. After a Huawei Cloud Stack cloud server is backed up, the system will retain the snapshot on the production storage. You can enable this function to prevent the snapshot from occupying capacity on the production storage. After this function is enabled, the system will delete the snapshot from the production storage upon backup completion, and all subsequent forever incremental (synthetic full) backups will be converted into full backups.
